text:
We’ve all been waiting a long time for Sunday’s episode of Keeping Up With the Kardashians, because it’s all about the moment the Kardashian-Jenners learn of Tristan Thompson’s cheating scandal.

And now we know that it was Kylie Jenner who told Khloé Kardashian the shocking news.

In a new teaser clip for the next episode, Kendall, Kourtney, Kim, Kylie and Scott Disick react to the cheating allegations, with Kim telling producers, “there’s a video of Tristan making out with a girl last night. Khloe’s gonna die. She’s literally going to go into labour over this”.

Though none of the sisters are together when the news breaks, they share messages with each other to piece together what’s happened.

Kendall, who is in the car with Scott Disick when she finds out, reads aloud one of the allegations about the NBA star: “The woman who filmed the clip said, ‘I was there and he was on the table right next to us with a group of friends and everybody watched them make out several times.'

“I’m in shock right now. I don’t even know what to say,” Kendall continues. “Like, what a f*cking idiot. It’s a sick joke.”

It's then revealed that Kylie texted Khloe the article, but she's not responding to any of her sister's messages.

"No one had the courage to tell Khloé because we knew she was days away from giving birth. We didn't want to stress her out, but we knew it was the right thing to do, so I'm the one who told Khloé," Kylie admits.

“I didn’t want to hurt her feelings, but I felt like she should hear from one of us versus on the internet,” she adds.

The clip ends rather dramatically when Kim answers the phone to Khloe’s best friend Malika, who simply says, “What the f*ck is that?!”

Woah, that's intense.

The episode was filmed in April when the cheating news broke. Khloe then went into labour and gave birth to True two days later. Fast forward to November and fans still aren’t sure if Khloé and Tristan's relationship has recovered from the scandal.

Instagram Stories/Tristan Thompson

Tristan shared his first ever family selfie on Halloween, but a recent People source says Khloe has been having a “really tough” time and “still has a lot of hurt and anger”.



The 34-year-old has also admitted that the whole thing is “hard to relive”, so something tells me she’s going to avoid watching this episode.
